name: Space Shuttle Flight Simulator 3D: Launch
description:
Space Shuttle Flight Simulator 3D: Launch
Be ready for the best adventure of your life with our new spaceship simulator in 3D! Ever dreamed of becoming an astronaut? We give you a chance to make your dream true! Feel as a real astronaut, control space shuttle and explore the infinity! Try Space Shuttle Flight Simulator 3D: Launch and gain unusual flight experience!

Start amazing space trip leaving the Earth with this space simulator! Get realistic flight experience trying to dock to the ISS or bring a satellite into orbit! Check Space Shuttle Flight Simulator 3D: Launch game and explore infinite space expanses!

Use NASA technologies, dock to ISS and explore the solar system with this space flight simulator! Watch planet and asteroids through the window and avoid space crashes! Get your skills to a new level - bring satellites into orbit, scan of the structure of realistic spacecraft, space shuttle and even an ISS with its’ engines and moving parts!

Control your spacecraft just tapping and tilting a device and explore a detailed solar system with all sorts of spaceships - try different ones and upgrade it with modern NASA technologies! Show your worth as an astronaut and have fun with Space Shuttle Flight Simulator 3D: Launch!
Launch your shuttle from the spaceport, go into Earth orbit and finally dock the ISS with Space Shuttle Flight Simulator 3D: Launch – great app for all ages!

Space Shuttle Flight Simulator 3D: Launch features:
- Enjoy picturesque views of Solar System – find all planets there
- Explore structures of your space shuttle, spaceship, and even the ISS
- Participate the whole cycle of space shuttle launch and flight
- Try different spaceships and improve it with the realistic NASA technologies

Get into your space shuttle and have a good trip, astronaut! Enjoy the views of all planets from our solar system and infinite expanses of space!
